Gaya Catherine Zeta-Jones dan Putrinya jadi Duta Fendi
03 Nov 2019, 01:35 by Cantika.com, Mila Novita
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Aktris Catherine Zeta-Jones dan putrinya, Carys Douglas, didaulat menjadi duta merek terbaru Fendi untuk mempromosikan koleksi tas Peekaboo. Kemunculan duo ibu dan putri ini dalam kampanye terbaru Fendi menggantikan klan Kardashian.
Desain tas ini ikonik dan lekat dengan brand asal Italia tersebut. Untuk pemotretan kampanye #MeAndMyPeekaboo, ibu-anak ini berpose di depan bangunan bersejarah di Roma, yakni Palazzo Altemps dan Palazzo Della Civiltà Italiana. Melansir laman Pagesix, lokasi ini dipilih untuk memelihara dialog antara klasik dan kontemporer. "Tas peekaboo Fendi menjadi bintang protagonis yang nyata,” keterangan di dalam siaran pers yang diterima laman Pagesix.
Aktris 50 tahun ini ikut mengunggah momen kali pertama membintangi iklan bersama putrinya di akun Instagram. Ia menuliskan di keterangan foto, “#MeAndMyPeekaboo momen syuting yang menakjubkan bersama @fendi di Roma bersama @carys.douglas. Tas klasik dengan sentuhan modern twist.”
Dalam syuting iklan tersebut, Catherine nampak mengenakan blus coklat bermotif bahan satin. Blus lengan panjang ini dilengkapi detail ikatan pita besar di bagian leher. Atasan blus dipadu dengan celana hitam. Istri Michael Douglas ini terlihat membawa tas Peekaboo berwarna putih.
Sementara itu, putrinya yang berusia 16 tahun terlihat bergaya kasual dinamis. Ia nampak mengenakan kaus coklat bermotif dipadu rok lipit coklat tua. Saat syuting, Carys tampil dengan dua tas berbeda, yaitu peekaboo merah dan hitam. Ia mengenakan tas itu dengan cara diselempangkan.
Sebelum peluncuran iklan Peekaboo Fendi, ibu-anak ini menjadi model sampul Vanity Fair Spanyol untuk edisi September 2019. Mereka kompak mengenakan koleksi busana Fendi berwarna hijau zaitun. Tahun lalu, putrinya dengan Michael Douglas membuat debut sampul majalah untuk Town & Country.
Kris Jenner, Kim Kardashian, dan North West menjadi duta merek peekaboo tahun 2018 silam. Kemunculan North di iklan tersebut merupakan kali pertama untuknya membintangi kampanye brand fashion, setelah sebelumnya tampil di editorial majalah untuk CR Fashion Book and Vogue. Pada awal 2019, North terpilih menjadi model sampul majalah untuk kali pertama. Wajah anak sulung Kim Kardashian dan Kanye West ini menghiasi Majalah Women’s Wear Daily’s Beauty Inc.

SILVY RIANA PUTRI

Style Catherine Zeta-Jones and her daughter became Ambassador Fendi
03 Nov 2019, 01:35 by Cantika.com, Mila Novita
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Actress Catherine Zeta-Jones and her daughter, Carys Douglas, were asked to become Fendi's newest brand ambassadors to promote the Peekaboo bag collection. The appearance of the mother and daughter duo in the latest Fendi campaign replaces the Kardashian clan.
The design of this bag is iconic and attached to the Italian brand. For the #MeAndMyPeekaboo campaign photo shoot, the mother-child poses in front of historic buildings in Rome, namely Palazzo Altemps and Palazzo Della Civiltà Italiana. Launching Pagesix pages, this location was chosen to maintain dialogue between classic and contemporary. "Fendi's peekaboo bag has become a real protagonist star," the statement in a press release received on the Pagesix page.
The 50-year-old actress also uploaded the moment for the first time starring in an ad with her daughter on an Instagram account. He wrote in the photo caption, "#MeAndMyPeekaboo an amazing filming moment with @fendi in Rome with @ carys.douglas. A classic bag with a modern twist. "
In shooting the ad, Catherine appeared wearing a satin blouse patterned in satin. This long-sleeved blouse features a large bow tie detail at the neck. Blouse tops combined with black pants. Michael Douglas's wife is seen carrying a white Peekaboo bag.
Meanwhile, her 16-year-old daughter looks dynamic casual style. He appeared to be wearing a brown shirt with a dark brown pleated skirt combined. When shooting, Carys appeared with two different bags, namely red and black peekaboo. He wore the bag by sling it.
Before the launch of the Peekaboo Fendi ad, the mother-daughter became the cover model of the Spanish Vanity Fair for the September 2019 edition. They were compact wearing an olive green Fendi fashion collection. Last year, his daughter with Michael Douglas made the debut of a magazine cover for Town & Country.
Kris Jenner, Kim Kardashian and North West became ambassadors of the peekaboo brand in 2018. North's appearance in the ad is the first time for him to star in a fashion brand campaign, having previously appeared in a magazine editorial for CR Fashion Book and Vogue. In early 2019, North was chosen as the magazine's cover model for the first time. The faces of the eldest son Kim Kardashian and Kanye West adorn the magazine Women’s Wear Daily’s Beauty Inc.

SILVY RIANA PRINCESS
